name: Bonds of Yggdrasil
description:
Find your way home. 

My entry for the SGDA Summer 2020 Game Jam, Theme: Internet Friends. An RPG made in the Godot engine where you freeze enemies and push your problems away with two of your closest internet friends. A short game, but one I had fun with regardless.  This was a project I worked on by myself, using assets from opengameart.org and itch.io. Credits and attribution can be found in the devlog, as well as the credits of the game.

Anooj Vadodkar - Programming, Writing, Game Design/Level Layout
